systemClasses

Class SystemController

  • java.lang.Object
    • systemClasses.SystemController

  • public class SystemController
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class of the system. It controls fundamental operations of the system.
    Author:
    pedroirivera-vega

      • addNewDocument

        public java.lang.String addNewDocument(java.lang.String docName)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        To be executed whenever the user initiates an action of adding a new document to the system. Tries to register a new document in the index system.
        Parameters:
        docName - name of the file containing the text of the document to add
        Returns:
        Returns a string message summarizing the final result or status of the operation.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there are problems with files

        Returns:

      • registerDataInMIM

        private void registerDataInMIM(int docID,
                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> documentWordsMap)
        Registers all data of the new document in mim structure. For each word in the document, there will be a pair (docID, frequency) that will be added.
        Parameters:
        docID - the id of the new document being added
        documentWordsMap - content of the document in a map with entries: (word, list of locations)

      • removeIDXFile

        private void removeIDXFile(int docID)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                           java.io.IOException
        This method removes the idx file from the system
        Parameters:
        docID - id of the document
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - invalid id
        java.io.IOException - input or output error with files

      • saveMapToIDXFile

        private void saveMapToIDXFile(int docID,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> documentWordsMap)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Generates the idx file that corresponds to the new document.
        Parameters:
        docID - id of the new document
        documentWordsMap - map containing the words in the document, and, for each word, the list of locations where it appears in the document
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there are problems with file: file format, etc.

      • fillMapFromDocumentText

        private void fillMapFromDocumentText(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> documentWordsMap,
                                     java.io.RandomAccessFile docFile)
        This method executes and important part of the process of adding a new document to the index: the part of extracting the words from the new document and each one of the locations (byte indexes) where the word appears in the document. Reads the content in document's file. For each different word it ends with one entry whose key is the word itself, and the value is the list of locations of that word in the document. That content is saved in a map collection, in entries in which the word is the key and the list of locations is its value.
        Parameters:
        documentWordsMap - the map to be created
        docFile - the file where the document's content is located.

      • search

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,MatchingSearchDocument> search(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> wtSearchList)
                                                               throws java.io.IOException
        Initiates the search for words in a given list.
        Parameters:
        wtSearchList - the list of words to search
        Returns:
        A map whose entries are of the form: key = docID, value = list of locations in the particular document where one of the words in the search list begins (really, the index of its first byte in the file)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - input or output error with files
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • addToMatchingDocumentsMap

        private void addToMatchingDocumentsMap(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,MatchingSearchDocument> mdm,
                                       int docID,
                                       java.lang.String word,
                                       int numberOfWordsToSearch)
                                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                       java.io.IOException
        To the collection of matching documents add entry for each matching document, which includes entries consisting of the docID and a corresponding object of type SearchMatchingDocument. This object will contain the list of locations in the document that correspond to the first character in any occurrence of any of the search words that have been identified as belonging to the document.
        Parameters:
        mdm - Collection of matching documents, initially, an empty map.
        docID - the id number for the matching document
        word - the given word
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - invalid id
        java.io.IOException - input or output error with files

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the SystemController object. Must be done when exiting the system.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the name

      • showNotAddedFiles

        private void showNotAddedFiles(java.io.File docFilePath)
        This method is used to show all files that have not been added to the system. Useful when the option of '*' is selected.
        Parameters:
        docFilePath - path of the documents directory
